records.location_details: Location of the incident: Text Removed - Justification 4. Reference to the operational area: Yes. Final outcome: hospitalized in Alexandroupolis.
records.uncertainty_note: Exact location of incident redacted; hospitalization location is Alexandroupolis.
records.context_note: A Frontex-involved individual, part of Hellenic Police, tested positive for COVID-19. The individual followed local procedures, informed a doctor, and was quarantined. After not improving, a COVID-19 test was performed, which was positive. The individual is currently hospitalized in Alexandroupolis. Equipment used by other individuals was washed and disinfected.
records.evidence_quote: Hellenic Police Office COVID-19 Confirmation Case... Nowadays, Text Removed - Justification 2 is hospitalized in Alexandroupolis.

records.location_details: Location of the incident: Text Removed - Justification 4. Reference to the operational area: Yes. Information/Allegations: ...hospitalized at the Military Hospital in Sofia.
records.uncertainty_note: Exact location of incident redacted; hospitalization location is Military Hospital in Sofia.
records.context_note: A Frontex-deployed individual in Bulgaria was hospitalized at the Military Hospital in Sofia with symptoms compatible with COVID-19. The individual had experienced breathing difficulties and chest/lung pain. Initial medical assistance was provided, but symptoms worsened, leading to hospitalization. A COVID-19 test was performed, which later returned a NEGATIVE result. The individual was discharged and sent to accommodation.
records.evidence_quote: One Text Removed - Justification 2 hospitalized in Sofia Military Hospital... On 20.03.2020 around 10:30, Text Removed - Justification 2 was informed that Covid-19 test gave a NEGATIVE result.
